Client.logic

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Client.logic.Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    Presents one bullet in the offline game with all its features such as location , speed , time handling and image file . Handles movement of a bullet in the map and reflecting it when hitting walls and also breaking the breakable walls when they have no other lives left .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bullet(double angle, int xTank, int yTank)
      Makes a new bullet object .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAngle()
      Gets the angle of the bullet .
      java.io.File getBulletImage()
      Returns image file of bullet .
      long getShootTime()
      Gets the time which the bullet is visible in the map .
      int getX()
      Gets bullet's location x .
      int getY()
      Gets bullet's location y .
      void moveBullet()
      Makes the bullet move according to the other walls and reflects it when hitting walls .
